circumstances:
The airplane departed RAF Swanton Morley at 1755LT on an anti-shipping operation. Approaching the Dutch coast, it was shot down by a Me.109 and crashed into the sea off Terschelling. All three crew members were killed. 
Crew:
P/O Leslie Sheridon Clayton, 
P/O Victor Eric George Phillips,
Sgt Arthur James Stiddard.
probable_cause: Shot down by a German fighter.
